parts.data: Job description IBM Research Brazil is seeking exceptional software engineers and developers to conduct to be part of a highly dynamic team of computer scientists working on the edge of computer science. The successful candidate may be also involved in engineering efforts spanning all the 12 global labs of IBM Research, as well as in projects crossing all organizations of IBM. A successful candidate is expected to pursue a career at IBM Research where he/she produces patents as well as other intellectual property assets and occasionally publishes in top-quality journals and conferences. Knowledge and experience in projects involving cloud and mobile computing are essential, as well as previous work on DevOps environments. A Master degree (stricto sensu) in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Physics, Mathematics, or related areas, is required, as well as fluency in English. Good communication skills and an interest in solving real world problems are expected. International experience and/or demonstrated participation in research work are pluses. Required Master's Degree English: Fluent Preferred At least 3 years experience in Software Development At least 3 years experience in Software Architecture At least 2 years experience in Software Engineering and Development Methodologies At least 2 years experience in Cloud Software Development At least 2 years experience in Mobile Software Development Basic knowledge in Data Science and Machine Learning At least 1 year experience in DevOps Spanish : Intermediate
